variables.label: Prowlarr Version
variables.description: Check out their Docker page for the valid tags https://github.com/linuxserver/docker-prowlarr/pkgs/container/prowlarr/versions

variables.label: Timezone
variables.description: Specify a timezone to use EG Europe/London, find yours at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones

variables.label: User ID
variables.description: User ID that the process uses, run (id $user) in your instance to see the id

variables.label: Group ID
variables.description: Group ID that the process uses, run (id $user) in your instance to see the id

instructions.start: Prowlarr is a indexer manager/proxy built on the popular arr .net/reactjs base stack to integrate with your various PVR apps. Prowlarr supports both Torrent Trackers and Usenet Indexers. It integrates seamlessly with Sonarr, Radarr, Lidarr, and Readarr offering complete management of your indexers with no per app Indexer setup required (we do it all).
instructions.end:
Aaaand you're done! ðŸ˜„ Your service is available at http://$$cap_appname.$$cap_root_domain
To set a authenticition visit http://$$cap_appname.$$cap_root_domain/settings/general and change the settings under "Security"

description: Prowlarr is a indexer manager/proxy built on the popular arr .net/reactjs base stack to integrate with your various PVR apps. A Jackett alternative.
